languages.text: "{name}!" {n}, — еле отдышавшись, шепчет Кассия. Ее лицо раскраснелось, волосы спутались, а тонкие плечи дрожат от волнения и сдерживаемых слез.{/n} "Это и правда вы..." {n}Кассия протягивает руку и нежно касается вашей щеки, но пугается собственного порыва и тут же отдергивает ее.{/n}

traits.locale_text: "{name}!" {n}, — еле отдышавшись шепчет Кассия. Ее лицо раскраснелось, волосы спутались, а тонкие плечи дрожат от волнения и сдерживаемых слез.{/n} "Это и правда вы..." {n}Кассия протягивает руку и нежно касается вашей щеки, но пугается собственного порыва и тут же одергивает ее.{/n}

languages.text: "{name}!" {n}Cassia whispers the moment she finds her breath. Her pallid face is flushed, her hair is dishevelled, and her delicate shoulders are trembling with agitation and barely contained tears.{/n} "It really is you..." {n}Cassia reaches out her clawed hand and gently touches your cheek, but then, startled by her own impulse, immediately jerks it back.{/n}

Her face is red, her hair is dishevelled, and her delicate shoulders are trembling with agitation and barely contained tears.{/n} "It really is you..." {n}Cassia reaches out her hand and gently touches your cheek, but then, startled by her own urge, immediately jerks it back.{/n}

languages.text: “{name}！”{n}一恢复呼吸，卡西娅就低声叫了起来。她苍白的脸变得通红，头发蓬乱，泪盈于睫，纤细的肩膀因为激动而颤抖不已。{/n}“真的是你……”{n}卡西娅伸出手，轻轻抚上你的脸颊，然后又像是突然惊觉自己的逾越般抽回了手。{/n}
languages.original_text: "{name}!" {n}Cassia whispers the moment she finds her breath. Her pallid face is flushed, her hair is dishevelled, and her delicate shoulders are trembling with agitation and barely contained tears.{/n} "It really is you..." {n}Cassia reaches out her clawed hand and gently touches your cheek, but then, startled by her own impulse, immediately jerks it back.{/n}

traits.locale_text: “{name}！”{n}一恢复呼吸，卡西娅就低声叫了起来。她脸色通红，头发蓬乱，泪盈于睫，纤细的肩膀因为激动而颤抖不已。{/n}“真的是你……”{n}卡西娅伸出手，轻轻抚上你的脸颊，然后又像是突然惊觉自己的逾越般抽回了手。{/n}

languages.text: "{name}!"{n}, flüstert Cassia, sobald sie den Atem wiederfindet. Ihr blasses Gesicht ist errötet, ihre Haare sind zerzaust, und ihre zierlichen Schultern zittern vor Aufregung und mühsam zurückgehaltenen Tränen.{/n} "Ihr seid es wirklich ..." {n}Cassia streckt ihre Krallenhand aus und berührt sanft deine Wange. Doch dann, erschrocken über ihren eigenen Impuls, zieht sie die Hand schnell wieder zurück.{/n}
languages.original_text: "{name}!" {n}Cassia whispers the moment she finds her breath. Her pallid face is flushed, her hair is dishevelled, and her delicate shoulders are trembling with agitation and barely contained tears.{/n} "It really is you..." {n}Cassia reaches out her clawed hand and gently touches your cheek, but then, startled by her own impulse, immediately jerks it back.{/n}

traits.locale_text: "{name}!"{n}, flüstert Cassia, sobald sie den Atem wiederfindet. Ihr Gesicht ist rot, ihre Haare sind zerzaust, und ihre zierlichen Schultern zittern vor Aufregung und mühsam zurückgehaltenen Tränen.{/n} "Ihr seid es wirklich ..." {n}Cassia streckt die Hand aus und berührt sanft deine Wange. Doch dann, erschrocken über ihren eigenen Impuls, zieht sie die Hand schnell wieder zurück.{/n}

languages.text: « {name} ! » {n}murmure Cassia après avoir retrouvé son souffle. Son visage si pâle généralement est empourpré, ses cheveux sont défaits, ses épaules délicates tremblent et elle contient difficilement ses larmes.{/n} « C'est vous... C'est vraiment vous ! » {n}dit-elle en tendant une main griffue pour toucher délicatement votre joue. Puis, surprise par son propre geste, elle retire immédiatement sa main.{/n}
languages.original_text: "{name}!" {n}Cassia whispers the moment she finds her breath. Her pallid face is flushed, her hair is dishevelled, and her delicate shoulders are trembling with agitation and barely contained tears.{/n} "It really is you..." {n}Cassia reaches out her clawed hand and gently touches your cheek, but then, startled by her own impulse, immediately jerks it back.{/n}

traits.locale_text: « {name} ! » {n}murmure Cassia sitôt après avoir retrouvé son souffle. Elle a le visage rouge, ses cheveux sont défaits, ses épaules délicates tremblent et elle contient difficilement ses larmes.{/n} « C'est vous... C'est vraiment vous ! » {n}dit-elle en tendant la main pour toucher délicatement votre joue. Puis, surprise par son propre geste, elle retire immédiatement sa main.{/n}

languages.text: «¡{name}!». {n}Cassia susurra en cuanto recupera el aliento. Su pálida cara está sonrojada, tiene el pelo revuelto y sus delicados hombros tiemblan de agitación y de intentar aguantar las lágrimas.{/n} «Es usted de verdad...». {n}Cassia extiende la mano, acabada en una garra, y te toca suavemente la mejilla solo para retirarla inmediatamente sobresaltada por su propio impulso.{/n}
languages.original_text: "{name}!" {n}Cassia whispers the moment she finds her breath. Her pallid face is flushed, her hair is dishevelled, and her delicate shoulders are trembling with agitation and barely contained tears.{/n} "It really is you..." {n}Cassia reaches out her clawed hand and gently touches your cheek, but then, startled by her own impulse, immediately jerks it back.{/n}

traits.locale_text: «¡{name}!». {n}Cassia susurra en cuanto recupera el aliento. Su pálida cara está sonrojada, tiene el pelo revuelto y sus delicados hombros tiemblan de agitación y de intentar aguantar las lágrimas.{/n} «Es usted de verdad...». {n}Cassia extiende la mano, acabada en una garra, y te toca suavemente la mejilla solo para retirarla inmediatamente sobresaltada por su propio impulso.{/n}

languages.text: 「{name}様！」{n}カシアは息がつけるときを見つけてつぶやく。彼女の白い顔は赤く、髪は乱れ、繊細な肩は動揺に震え、涙さえ浮かべている。{/n}「これは本当に{name}様なのですか…」{n}カシアは手をのばしてあなたの頬に優しく触れるが、そこで自分自身の衝動に驚いて、すぐに爪のある手を引っ込める。{/n}
languages.original_text: "{name}!" {n}Cassia whispers the moment she finds her breath. Her pallid face is flushed, her hair is dishevelled, and her delicate shoulders are trembling with agitation and barely contained tears.{/n} "It really is you..." {n}Cassia reaches out her clawed hand and gently touches your cheek, but then, startled by her own impulse, immediately jerks it back.{/n}

traits.locale_text: 「{name}様！」{n}カシアは息がつけるときを見つけてつぶやく。彼女の白い顔は赤く、髪は乱れ、繊細な肩は動揺に震え、涙さえ浮かべている。{/n}「これは本当に{name}様なのですか…」{n}カシアは手をのばしてあなたの頬に優しく触れるが、そこで自分自身の衝動に驚いて、すぐに爪のある手を引っ込める。{/n}

languages.text: "{name}!" {n}Cassia, nefesini toplar toplamaz fısıldıyor. Soluk yüzü kızarmış, saçları dağılmış, narin omuzları titrer hâlde, gözyaşlarına zorla engel oluyor.{/n} "Sahiden sendin..." {n}Cassia, sivri tırnaklı elini uzatıp nazikçe yanağına dokunuyor. Sonra bu davranışından ürküp kendini hızla geri çekiyor.{/n}
languages.original_text: "{name}!" {n}Cassia whispers the moment she finds her breath. Her pallid face is flushed, her hair is dishevelled, and her delicate shoulders are trembling with agitation and barely contained tears.{/n} "It really is you..." {n}Cassia reaches out her clawed hand and gently touches your cheek, but then, startled by her own impulse, immediately jerks it back.{/n}
